item.title: Coveillance
item.description: Advances in technology have changed our notions of privacy and what we need to do to protect it. In today’s world saturated surveillance is inevitable. Our only chance to restore the balance is to develop an approach that ensures that the watchers are also being watched.

item.title: Accountability Framework
item.description: Consent based regulation has not been particularly successful when it comes to protecting privacy. Instead of getting corporations to take our consent before they process our data we would do well to make them more accountable for their actions and the harms that befall us when the process our data indiscriminately.
